channel.title: Would You Rather
channel.description:
This is sort of like a forums game.. I say Would You Rather (Something..) Person who posts next has to answer it and say a "Would You Rather.." Quite Fun.. [size=25pt]RULES:[/size] [size=20pt]NO bad picsOGRAPHY!! No dumb questions (WYR chop off your leg or chop off your eye) Try to make them hard.[/size] -----------------------------------Demonstration--------------------------------------- Lil_Smok3r: Would You Rather Kiss the floor or kiss your grandma on the lips? Next Person: Kiss the floor.. Would you rather eat cow poo or a spider? --------------------------------------End of Demonstration-----------------------------
Lets Begin:
[size=14pt]Would You Rather Eat A Rotten Toe or Cow Poo?[/size]
--_Have fun!

item.title: Would You Rather
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“dindar22, post:969, topic:502273”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=620501.msg4471869#msg4471869 date=1423513934]

Oh lol

Hmm, American!

Would You rather Halo or CoD?

That’s not even a question…
Halo - There’s like 1/50th the population of 12 year olds that fucked my mom.

Would you rather be gay and unable to come out of the closet, or straight but EXTREMELY feminine (Like this feminine)
[/quote]
I am gay according to this are you gay quiz so what.[/quote]
The next level of spam botting ladies and gents.

Crawling the web for pages of gay comments and then posting a link to a quiz.

Read full topic

item.title: Would You Rather
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“stCky, post:967, topic:502273”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=620501.msg4472892#msg4472892 date=1424123315]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=620501.msg4472864#msg4472864 date=1424106427]

[quote author=Uncalled link=topic=620501.msg4472607#msg4472607 date=1423957819]

Obviously not near perfect if one could even get close to solving it. Get the fudge out of here you half retarded monkey.

Also. Those aren’t quotes.

You apparently don’t know the term "single quotes"
And with that. I’m done talking to you.
[/quote]They’re called apostrophes.
[/quote]http://english.stackexchange.com/questions/36046/apostrophe-vs-single-quote
[/quote]It would be relevant to me if the term, ‘single quote’ was taught in any American public school systems. I can’t say for sure that they are not, but most certainly not in Texan schools. Which is one of the lowest education systems in America.

I guess you learn something new everyday!

Is this guy serious? You know you’re on a forum with a lot of focus on programming right? How have you never heard the term single quotes?[/quote]I’m not sure, either. I guess that’s a typical American for ya.

Also, I am not very active here anymore. And this is a forum with a lot of focus on programming, not English literature. It’s still shocking to me regardless!

Read full topic

The second is asking if you’d want to solve a crime that seemed perfect (hence the quotes).

item.title: Would You Rather
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“stCky, post:956, topic:502273”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=620501.msg4472448#msg4472448 date=1423877986]

Kill myself.

Would you rather be only to hydrate yourself with vodka (straight), or never be able to drink again?

As in never be able to drink alcohol ever again? No alcohol.

WYR slice of the skin of one of your arms with a machete or impale both of your legs twice with reasonably scaled metal beams? gl
[/quote]

Crush my legs so I can sit on my ass for the rest of my life

WYR always smelling like shit or always smelling shit?[/quote]
Always smelling. You’d learn to tolerate and ignore the smell at one point. Otherwise you’d smell like shit and no one would want to be around you.

WYR Commit the perfect crime (meaning you never get caught) or solve the ‘perfect’ crime (catch the person who no one could)

Yeah, I know it’s cheesy.

Read full topic
